text: Fotini Dekazou Stefanopoulou (; died 7 October 2021) was a Greek academic and politician. She was a member of the Political Spring party. She was a member of the Hellenic Parliament from 1993 to 1996. Stefanopoulou was born in Athens, Greece. Stefanopoulou died on 7 October 2021 in Athens. ==References== Category:2021 deaths Category:Greek academics Category:Politicians from Athens
title: Fotini Dekazou Stefanopoulou
